message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe would be highly valuable to you.  I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Would this be acceptable to you?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is quite low for the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I am able to offer $12,500. This is my final offer.
